JOB DESCRIPTION:
Job Description : 

As an Lead Software Development Engineer in SV R&D,  you will have the opportunity to work with an experienced team developing new solutions for core Singleview. 

You will work collaboratively with other company delivery teams in Bangalore and Brisbane. 

You will leverage industry best practices and methodologies such as Agile,  Scrum,  test automation,  Continuous Integration and Continuous Deployment. 

Responsibilities 

Have a Bachelor s Degree in Computer Science,  Computer Engineering,  or related field. 

Have at least 9 years of technical experience in developing commercial/ enterprise level software products. 

Experience with modern CRM systems and concepts is favourable. 

Demonstrate exceptional programming ability.

Experience with full stack web development is essential. 

You should possess strong knowledge and ability in using JavaScript,  the AngularJS framework,  and the Node.js platform. 

Ability in languages like C/ C++,  Java and Perl is also favourable. 

Have excellent experience using UNIX/ LINUX environments to develop,  deploy,  and manage applications. 

Have excellent analytical and problem solving skills. 

Experience gathering and analysing information for the development of effective solutions to problems or situations. 

Can solve highest complexity problems quickly.

Be highly effective at communicating and collaborating across multiple teams,  ensuring understanding of both verbal and written material of the highest complexity,  with the ability to lead solutions in a clear and concise manner. 

Ability to leverage effective facilitation and negotiation techniques to elicit requirements from a diverse range of stakeholders

Experience with Agile methods and frameworks such as SAFe,  Scrum,  or Kanban is preferred. 

Programming and administration experience with Oracle (or other databases) is favourable. 

Be a self- motivated individual who works well in a team environment.
